email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for 5,000 MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai under CIF terms. The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 250m. The laycan is set for October 10th to October 15th, with a loading window of 48 hours.

Our initial freight quote is USD 45 per MT. Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 42 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Liam O'Connor
Ocean Cargo Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 43 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains October 10th to October 15th, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 43 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Liam O'Connor
Ocean Cargo Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Rotterdam on October 10th, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Liam O'Connor
Ocean Cargo Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Traders
